EmailTemplate.name: EC Survey Passive Promoter Thanks
EmailTemplate.subject: TE Connectivity Customer Survey – Thank you for your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TE Connectivity Customer Survey – Thank you for your feedback
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your participation in TE Connectivity’s (TE) recent customer survey. Your feedback enables us to better understand your needs, provides insights into our performance and helps us to establish our priorities for improvement. We value your opinions and are committed to implementing process improvements that enable us to better serve you.
We have noticed on this occasion that your response indicates you would be likely to recommend TE products and/or your distribution partner to a friend or colleague.
We are pleased to hear this and will continue to work on ways to improve your customer experience.
Should you have any questions or concerns, please email tecustomersurvey@te.com
Once again, thank you for partnering with us to drive an improved customer experience.
TE Connectivity TE Connectivity Ltd. company.
Privacy policy customer survey
1. This customer survey is conducted by TE Connectivity,1050 Westlakes Drive, Berwyn, PA 19312, USA (“TE”).
2. We will collect, process and use your responses to the extent necessary for survey participation and Customer Satisfaction research and support. Information collected from you will be linked to your name, company and mailing address, among other information ("Personal Data").
3. TE will use the information collected containing descriptive elements, such as geography, company, industry and distributor, as well as individual identifiers, such as name, phone number and email address, to cluster findings and discover trends We may share data related to the descriptive elements with your distribution partners for the purposes of customer satisfaction. We will not share Personal Data with your distribution partners.
4. Personal Data will be used for TE survey purposes only. In case you agreed with this, we may use this information to contact you should we want to discuss any information provided by you in the survey.
5. By participating in this survey, you agree that we may share your Personal Data with TE and with any of TE’s global affiliates as well as with service providers acting on our behalf for the data processing.
6. Please also read our website privacy policy that applies as well, as far as this policy does not change it.
To ensure future delivery of emails, add info@connections.te.com to your safe sender list or address book. Unfortunately, replies to this email will not receive a personal response
Your privacy is important to us, please take a moment to read our Privacy Policy .
Manage your subscriptions or unsubscribe from this mailing list.
© 2015 TE Connectivity Ltd. family of companies. All Rights Reserved.
TE Connectivity and TE (logo) are trademarks. Other company, product and service names may be trademarks or service marks of others. References in this e-mail to TE Connectivity products or services do not imply that TE Connectivity Ltd. intends to make them available in all countries.
TE Connectivity Ltd.
1050 Westlakes Drive, Berwyn, PA, 19312
